sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Security tokens
sect1.para: This page selects security tokens for WS-Security.

simplelist.member: Click to upload the choosen X.509 Certificate file with choosen file type and entered Password for Private key unlocking type.
Click to return back to the Partner Link properties page.

sect3.title: X.509 Certificate file
sect3.para: To upload X.509 Certificate file click the "Browse".

sect3.title: File type
sect3.para: Specify file type from the list.

sect3.title: Password for Private key unlocking type
sect3.para: Specify Password for Private key unlocking type.

sect3.title: Select existing key
sect3.para: Specify value from the list to be selected for the Security tokens.
